Description: Try raising your Layer Level. Not only does it increase your stat values, but there are level bonuses when reaching certain levels which improve stats even more than before.
Try out Dispatch Missions. Either wait for the time to elapse or use a Return Request Form to improve your character's stats.
When victory seems impossible, try a quest with a lower difficulty level. It might be far easier than the one you're currently stuck on.
Your stats might rise after clearing certain quests. The most effective way of clearing quests is to use idle battling.
You can increase your stats with weapons and equipment. By using material that strengthen your equipment you can further improve their stats.
You can get stat bonuses by increasing the Memory Rank. You can obtain items from clearing quests with a raised Memory Rank.
By using specific Gears on the Layer, the Layer's Gear Level increases. This not only improves stat values but also results in Gear Bonuses.
